article:
Having said goodbye to his parents, Alvin, with his wife and one-year-old son, set off back home.   _  excited,

"The snow doesn't seem to   _  .Shall we stay in the car waiting to be frozen to death or walk ahead through the snow?" Alvin asked.Clare said she   _  to

Night came.They were not afraid of the dark.But they were   _  that

One, two, three, ...seven days passed.On the eighth day,   _  at
